name: Wilderness (itch) (gnitsaf, Tonik Games)
description:
Wilderness is a game entry for Alakajam 16. Created by Gnitsaf (PsychicAsh) and Baconinvader (https://tonikgames.itch.io/). 

Play on web, wait for it to load, or download it for windows.

Deserted on an island, you must collect and craft enough materials to fix your broken radio and call for help. Avoid man hungry pigs and make sure you stay healthy.

CONTROLS

WSDA - MOVEMENT

CONTROL/LEFT MOUSE ATTACK (IF WEAPON CRAFTED)

SPACE (HOLD TO INTERACT)

NUMBERS TO SELECTED CRAFTED ITEMS (SHOWN IN UPPER RIGHT)
